official_title: To reserve one-third of the amounts provided for housing rehabilitation loans for rehabilitation of properties in rural areas.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1964 to reserve a specified amount of housing rehabilitation loans for rural housing rehabilitation.

titles.title: To reserve one-third of the amounts provided for housing rehabilitation loans for rehabilitation of properties in rural areas.
